report.title: Download occurrences (standard filters)
report.description: A list of GBNNSIP records for download.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences_functional o join occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id join cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

column.name: vice_county
column.sql: (select string_agg(vc.name, ', ') as vcnames from locations vc where o.location_ids @> ARRAY[vc.id] and vc.location_type_id=15)

column.name: comment
column.sql:
TRIM(LEADING E'
' FROM COALESCE(occ.comment, s.comment, '') || COALESCE(E'
Admin comment:
' || (snf.attrs_json->>'1140'), '') || COALESCE(E'
Correspondence:
' || (snf.attrs_json->>'1141'), ''))

column.name: images_provided
column.sql: case when o.media_count > 0 then 'y' else 'n' end

column.name: record_status
column.sql: case o.record_status || coalesce(o.record_substatus::text, '') when 'V' then 'Accepted' when 'V1' then 'Accepted as correct' when 'V2' then 'Accepted as considered correct' when 'C3' then 'Plausible' when 'C' then 'Pending review' when 'R' then 'Rejected' when 'R4' then 'Rejected as unable to verify' when 'R5' then 'Rejected as incorrect' when 'I' then 'Data entry in progress' when 'D' then 'Dubious' else 'Unknown' end

column.name: investigation_status
column.sql: case occ.metadata->>'Statutory body status' when 'P' then 'Pending' when 'I' then 'In progress' when 'C' then 'Complete' when 'FI' then 'Awaiting further information from recorder' when 'FOB' then 'Forwarded to FOB' when 'NBU' then 'NBU visit requested' when 'SR' then 'Sample requested' when 'O' then 'Other' when 'RC' then 'Record closed' end
